Inside a Stickleback's Eye

This may be surprising, but dissecting a stickleback eye to screen it for parasite, can be like opening a tiny galaxy.

n°1 Severed stickleback head

n°2 Enucluated eye-ball

n°3 Tearing-apart of the eye-ball

n°4 Opened eye = Galaxy
